DataElement.preferredDefinition: Procedure where the individual examines their own breasts for lumps and other changes._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::12_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Self-Examination Last 12 Months Performed Medical Examination Breast
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Procedure where the individual examines their own breasts for lumps and other changes._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::12_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. Concepts.definition: One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.
An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Executed and carried through to completion.
